original_text: And God said, “This is the sign of the covenant I am making between me and you and every living creature with you, a covenant for all generations to come:
korean_text: 하나님이 이르시되 내가 나와 너희와 및 너희와 함께 하는 모든 생물 사이에 대대로 영원히 세우는 언약의 증거는 이것이니라

sentences.original_text: This is the sign of the covenant
I am making between me and you
and every living creature with you
a covenant for all generations to come
